targets.expr: count(sum(kube_pod_labels{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$app-$group.*", label_app!~""}) by (pod, label_app)) by (label_app)

defaults.noValue: No container has uptime less than an hour.

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", node=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"}) * count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", node=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"}) * count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod))

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", container!~"^(POD|)$"}[1m]))
count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:k8s-worker:.*:$host", mode="idle"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", node=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}) * count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", node=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}) * count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod))

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", container!~"^(POD|)$"})
sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job=~"$cluster(.*)-node-exporter", instance=~"$cluster:k8s-worker:.*:$host"})

count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod))

count(sum(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job=~"k8s-cadvisor-$cluster", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", container=~"$container", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9"}) by (pod, container))
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*"}) by (phase)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", phase=~"Failed"}) by (phase, pod, namespace) > 0
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", phase=~"Pending"}) by (phase, pod, namespace) > 0
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", phase=~"Unknown"}) by (phase, pod, namespace) > 0
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", phase=~"Succeeded"}) by (phase, pod, namespace) > 0

sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*", phase=~"Running|Succeeded"}) == sum(kube_pod_status_phase{job=~"k8s-kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~".*$group.*", pod=~"$app.*"})

sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace"}/kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job=~"$cluster-k8s-kubelet", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{job=~"$cluster-k8s-kubelet", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
sum(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job=~"$cluster-k8s-kubelet", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
sum(redis_queue_job_count{instance=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app.*"}) by (queue, app)
sum(redis_queue_job_count{instance=~"$host", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app.*"}) by (queue, app)
